name: Tumblr Dark | aperopia
additional_info:
Version:

  • v 1.6 - (16 February 2016) - messenger fix
  • v 1.5 - (15 February 2016) - color updates and added messenger
  • v 1.4 - (05 December 2015) - color updates and additions
  • v 1.3 - (08 November 2015) - color updates and fixes
  • v 1.2 - (28 October 2015) - modified audio player
  • v 1.1 - (26 October 2015) - Various pages added
  • v 1.0 - (24 October 2015) - first release


more themes: userstyles, wikipedia, 9gag
css:
